detail_desc: Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.

detail_desc: Two-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a lining that can be used as a decorative handkerchief, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
